targets.rawSql:
select count(a.id) as TOTAL
        from gestion.caso a
          inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
					inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso = a.id
					inner join gestion.resolutorio b on b.id = c.id_resolutorio
       where --a.id_sub_categoria in (1) and 
				d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) --and d.active = 1
				and b.nombre in ($hidro)

select count(*) as TOTAL
                from gestion.caso a
                inner join gestion.historico c on c.id_caso = a.id  
				inner join gestion.responsable d on d.id_caso = a.id
				inner join gestion.resolutorio b on b.id = d.id_resolutorio
            where a.id_sub_categoria in (1) and 
                c.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
				        and a.id_extra_categoria is not null
				        and b.nombre in ($hidro)
                --and c.active = 1

select count(*) as TOTAL
      	from gestion.caso a
          inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
		  inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
		  inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
      where a.id_sub_categoria in (1) and 
            d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) /*and d.active = 1*/ and a.id_extra_categoria is null
	        and c.nombre in ($hidro)

SELECT case when m.name is null then c.name else m.name end as sub_categoria, COUNT(a.id) as total 
	         FROM gestion.caso a 
                inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
                inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
				inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
				inner join gestion.resolutorio e on e.id = b.id_resolutorio
                LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria   
            where c.id in (1) and 
			   d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) 
			   --and d.active = 1
			   and e.nombre in ($hidro)
            GROUP BY sub_categoria order by total desc

SELECT --DISTINCT ON (a.codigo) a.codigo::Text "CODIGO CASO", 
    a.nombre::Text "CODIGO CASO", 
	  e.cedula::Text "CEDULA", e.nombre::TEXT "DENUNCIANTE",
			e.telefono::Text "TELEFONO", b.nombre::Text "ESTADO", c.nombre::Text "MUNICIPIO", d.nombre::Text "PARROQ", a.direccion::TEXT "DIRECCION", a.descripcion::TEXT "DESCRIP", 
			f.name::Text "CATEGORIA", g.name::Text "SUBCATEG",case when m.name is null then 'Sin ExtCateg' else m.name end::Text "EXTCATEG", 
      case when n.name is null then 'Sin Categ Adi' else n.name end::Text "CATEG ADI",
			i.nombre::Text "ESTATUS",
			to_char(a.fecha, 'dd-mm-YY  hh:mm:ss')::Text "FECHA",
			to_char(h.fecha_registro,'dd-mm-YY hh:mm:ss') as "FECHA ESTATUS",
      case when k.nombre is null then 'Analizando' else k.nombre end::Text "INSTITUCION",
      --case when v.name is null then 'Analizando' else (v.name || ' ' || v.last_name ) end::Text "RESPONSABLE",
	 --	v.phone::Text "TELF. RESP",
			CASE WHEN h.id_estatus in (6) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI') THEN 'VERIFICADO' ELSE 'NO VERIFICADO' END AS "VERIFICACION",
			case when a.feedback >= 1 and a.feedback < 1.5 then 'MUY POCO SATISFACHO'
                  when a.feedback >= 1.5 and a.feedback < 2.5 then 'INSATISFECHO'
                  when a.feedback >= 2.5 and a.feedback < 3.5 then 'SATISFECHO'
                  when a.feedback > 3.5 then 'MUY SATISFECHO'
                  when a.feedback is null then 'SIN VALORACIÓN'
                  end as "VALORACION"
			
			--CONCAT(case when round(avg(a.feedback)) = 1 then 'MUY POCO SATISFACHO'
                 -- when round(avg(a.feedback)) = 2 then 'INSATISFECHO'
                  --when round(avg(a.feedback)) = 3 then 'SATISFECHO'
                 -- when round(avg(a.feedback)) > 3 then 'MUY SATISFECHO'
                  --when round(avg(a.feedback)) is null then 'SIN VALORACIÓN'
                 -- end) as "PROMEDIO"
		  --a.feedback is	(CASE WHEN a.feedback >= 3.5 THEN 1) AS "MUY SATISFECHO",
			--(CASE WHEN a.feedback < 3.5 and a.feedback >= 2.5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "SATISFECHO",
     -- (CASE WHEN a.feedback < 2.5 and a.feedback >= 1.5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "INSATISFECHO",
		--	(CASE WHEN a.feedback < 1.5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "MUY POCO SATISFACHO"
			--a.feedback as "Valoracion"
			
      FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
			-- inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula usuario ubch
            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            inner JOIN gestion.historico h ON h.id_caso = a.id
            inner JOIN gestion.estatus i ON h.id_estatus = i.id            
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = h.id_caso --a.id and j.id_user is not null
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
            LEFT JOIN  public.user w ON w.id = j.id_user
            --LEFT JOIN  public.user_detail v ON w.id = v.user_id
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category n ON n.id = a.id_adicional_categoria
            where h.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8) 
			--and h.active = 1 
			and a.id_sub_categoria in (1)
			and k.nombre in ($hidro)

panels.title: LISTADO DE CASOS  DE LA BASE DE DATOS

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (1)
    --and d.active = 1
    and a.id_origen = 1
    and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8) 
    --and a.id_estado in (22)

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (1)
    --and d.active = 1
    and a.id_origen = 1
    and d.id_estatus in (5) 
    --and a.id_estado in (22)

-- Casos Recibidos
SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (1)
    --and d.active = 1
    and a.id_origen = 2
    and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) 
    and a.id_estado in (1)

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (1)
    --and d.active = 1
    and a.id_origen = 2
    and d.id_estatus in (9) 
    and a.id_estado in (1)

-- Casos Cerrados
 select 
          ec.tx_nom_edo_caso::Text estatus,
          d.tx_nom_sub_categoria::Text servicio,
          count(c.id_caso)::Text subtotal,
          (select count(*) from caso where id_edo_caso in (7))::Text Total
        from 
            caso c 
            inner join edo_caso ec on c.id_edo_caso = ec.id_edo_caso 
            inner join public.caso_sub_categoria d on d.id_caso_sub_categoria = c.id_caso_subcateg
        where 
            ec.id_edo_caso in (7)
            GROUP BY ec.tx_nom_edo_caso, servicio;

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
	inner join gestion.resolutorio e on e.id = b.id_resolutorio
	where  
	a.id_sub_categoria in (1) --and 	d.active = 1
  and d.id_estatus in (3,4,5,6,7,8)
	and e.nombre in ($hidro)

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
	inner join gestion.resolutorio e on e.id = b.id_resolutorio
	where  
	a.id_sub_categoria in (1) --and d.active = 1
  and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)
	and e.nombre in ($hidro)

-- Casos Recibidos
 SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
	inner join gestion.resolutorio e on e.id = b.id_resolutorio
	where  
	a.id_sub_categoria in (1) --and	d.active = 1
  and d.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8)
	and e.nombre in ($hidro)

-- Casos Cerrados
  SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
	inner join gestion.resolutorio e on e.id = b.id_resolutorio
	where  
	a.id_sub_categoria in (1) --and	d.active = 1
  and d.id_estatus in (6)
	and e.nombre in ($hidro)

-- Casos Cerrados
 SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::decimal * 100 / (SELECT count(a.id)
											FROM gestion.caso a
											inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
											inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
										  	inner join gestion.resolutorio e on e.id = b.id_resolutorio
											where a.id_sub_categoria in (1) /*and d.active = 1 */and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)
									 		and e.nombre in ($hidro))::decimal, 2) as porcentaje
		FROM gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
		inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
		inner join gestion.resolutorio e on e.id = b.id_resolutorio
		where a.id_sub_categoria in (1)
		and e.nombre in ($hidro)
		--and d.active = 1 
		and d.id_estatus in (6);

--Total de Casos por Fecha
select to_char(a.fecha, 'dd-mm-YY') as fecham, count(a.fecha) as total
    	from gestion.caso a
        inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
    		inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
    	 	inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
	where  a.fecha > CAST(now()::timestamp AS DATE) - CAST('15 days' AS INTERVAL)
		/*and d.active = 1*/ and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
		and c.nombre in ($hidro)
        group by fecham 
        order by fecham

panels.title: HISTÓRICO DE CASOS RECIBIDO EN EL SISTEMA DESDE LA VENAPP (ÚLTIMOS DÍAS)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT case when m.name is null then c.name else m.name end as sub_categoria, COUNT(a.id) as total 
	         FROM gestion.caso a 
                inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
                inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
                LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria 
				inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
				inner join gestion.resolutorio e on e.id = b.id_resolutorio
            where c.id in (1)
               and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) --and d.active = 1 
			   and e.nombre in ($hidro)
            GROUP BY sub_categoria
            ORDER BY total desc;

SELECT case when m.name is null then c.name else m.name end as sub_categoria, COUNT(a.id) as total 
	         FROM gestion.caso a 
                inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
                inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
                LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria 
				inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
				inner join gestion.resolutorio e on e.id = b.id_resolutorio
            where c.id in (1)
               and d.id_estatus in (6) --and d.active = 1 
			   and e.nombre in ($hidro)
            GROUP BY sub_categoria
            ORDER BY total desc;

select 	c.nombre as municipio, count(a.id) as total
    from gestion.caso a
	   inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
     inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
   	 inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
	   inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
	   inner join gestion.resolutorio f on f.id = e.id_resolutorio
	 where  a.id_sub_categoria in (1) /*and d.active = 1*/ and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8) 
	 and f.nombre in ($hidro)
    group by municipio
    order by total desc  Limit 10;

panels.title: ESTADOS CON MAYOR NUMERO DE CASOS EN EL SISTEMA

targets.rawSql:
select 
	c.nombre as municipio, count(a.id) as total
    from 
	gestion.caso a
	 inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
   inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
   inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
	 inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
	 inner join gestion.resolutorio f on f.id = e.id_resolutorio
	 where  a.id_sub_categoria in (1) /*and d.active = 1 */and d.id_estatus in (6) 
	 and f.nombre in ($hidro)
    group by municipio
    order by total desc
    Limit 10;

panels.title: ESTADOS CON MAYOR NUMERO DE CASOS RESUELTOS

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
	inner join gestion.resolutorio e on e.id = b.id_resolutorio
	where  
	a.id_sub_categoria in (1) --and 
	--d.active = 1
  and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)
	and e.nombre in ($hidro)

panels.title: TOTAL DE CASOS EN EL SISTEMA- $hidro

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
	inner join gestion.resolutorio e on e.id = b.id_resolutorio
	where  
	a.id_sub_categoria in (1) --and d.active = 1
  and d.id_estatus in (6)
	and e.nombre in ($hidro)

select 
           (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "MUNICIPIO", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
			inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio f on f.id = e.id_resolutorio
       where a.id_sub_categoria in (1) /*and
	   	d.active = 1*/ and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
        and f.nombre in ($hidro)
        group by c.nombre, b.nombre
        order by TOTAL desc

select 
           (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "MUNICIPIO", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
			inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio f on f.id = e.id_resolutorio
       where a.id_sub_categoria in (1)/* and
	   	d.active = 1 */and d.id_estatus in (6)
        and f.nombre in ($hidro)
        group by c.nombre, b.nombre
        order by TOTAL desc

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
	inner join gestion.resolutorio e on e.id = b.id_resolutorio
	where  
	a.id_sub_categoria in (1) --and d.active = 1
  and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)
	and e.nombre in ($hidro)

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
	inner join gestion.resolutorio e on e.id = b.id_resolutorio
	where  
	a.id_sub_categoria in (1) --and	d.active = 1
  and d.id_estatus in (6)
	and e.nombre in ($hidro)

select (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "PARROQUIAS", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.parroquia c on c.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
			inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio f on f.id = e.id_resolutorio
     	where a.id_sub_categoria in (1) /*and 
	 		d.active = 1*/ and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)  
			and f.nombre in ($hidro)
       		group by c.nombre, b.nombre order by TOTAL desc;

select (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "PARROQUIAS", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.parroquia c on c.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
			inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio f on f.id = e.id_resolutorio
     	where a.id_sub_categoria in (1) /*and 
	 		d.active = 1*/ and d.id_estatus in (6)  
			and f.nombre in ($hidro)
       		group by c.nombre, b.nombre order by TOTAL desc;

select b.nombre::Text "ESTADOS",
sum(CASE WHEN d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "RECIBIDO",
sum(CASE WHEN d.id_estatus in (3) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "ASIGNADO",
sum(CASE WHEN d.id_estatus in (4,8) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "EN PROCESO",
sum(CASE WHEN d.id_estatus in (6) AND ((a.feedback < 2 and a.verificado is null) or (a.feedback is null and a.verificado is null)) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "POR CONFIRMAR",
sum(CASE WHEN d.id_estatus in (6) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "ATENDIDO", --, count(a.id) as "TOTAL"
trunc(sum(CASE WHEN d.id_estatus in (6)  and  e.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI')
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal*100/count(*)::decimal,2) AS "% EFECTIVIDAD %"
from gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id
inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso =  d.id_caso
inner join gestion.resolutorio z on z.id =  e.id_resolutorio
inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
where  /*d.active = 1 and*/ d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8)
--and z.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3) 
and b.id < 25 and  e.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598)
and e.principal is true and z.nombre in ($hidro)
group by b.nombre
HAVING count(*) > 1
order by "% EFECTIVIDAD %" desc

SELECT a.nombre::Text "CODIGO CASO", 
	     e.cedula::Text "CEDULA", e.nombre::TEXT "DENUNCIANTE",
			 e.telefono::Text "TELEFONO", b.nombre::Text "ESTADO", c.nombre::Text "MUNICIPIO", d.nombre::Text "PARROQ", a.direccion::TEXT "DIRECCION", a.descripcion::TEXT "DESCRIP", 
			 f.name::Text "CATEGORIA", g.name::Text "SUBCATEG",case when m.name is null then 'Sin ExtCateg' else m.name end::Text "EXTCATEG", 
       case when n.name is null then 'Sin Categ Adi' else n.name end::Text "CATEG ADI",
			 i.nombre::Text "ESTATUS",
			 to_char(a.fecha, 'dd-mm-YY  hh:mm:ss')::Text "FECHA",
			 to_char(h.fecha_registro,'dd-mm-YY hh:mm:ss') as "FECHA ESTATUS",
       case when k.nombre is null then 'Analizando' else k.nombre end::Text "INSTITUCION",
      -- case when v.name is null then 'Analizando' else (v.name || ' ' || v.last_name ) end::Text "RESPONSABLE",
			-- v.phone::Text "TELF. RESP",
			 CASE WHEN h.id_estatus in (6) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI') THEN 'VERIFICADO' ELSE 'NO VERIFICADO' END AS "VERIFICACION",
			  case when a.feedback >= 1 and a.feedback < 1.5 then 'MUY POCO SATISFACHO'
                  when a.feedback >= 1.5 and a.feedback < 2.5 then 'INSATISFECHO'
                  when a.feedback >= 2.5 and a.feedback < 3.5 then 'SATISFECHO'
                  when a.feedback > 3.5 then 'MUY SATISFECHO'
                  when a.feedback is null then 'SIN VALORACIÓN'
                  end as "VALORACION"
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
inner JOIN gestion.historico h ON h.id_caso = a.id
inner JOIN gestion.estatus i ON h.id_estatus = i.id            
LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = h.id_caso 
LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
LEFT JOIN  public.user w ON w.id = j.id_user
--LEFT JOIN  public.user_detail v ON w.id = v.user_id
LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
LEFT JOIN  gestion.category n ON n.id = a.id_adicional_categoria
where h.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) 
--and h.active = 1 
and j.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598)
and j.principal is true

panels.title: LISTADO DE CASOS  DE LA BASE DE DATOS
LISTADO DE CASOS  DE AGUA EN LA BASE DE DATOS

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (1)
    --and d.active = 1
    --and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (1)
    --and d.active = 1
    and d.id_estatus in (5)

-- Casos Recibidos
 SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (1)
    --and d.active = 1
    and d.id_estatus in (15)

SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (1)
    --and d.active = 1
    and d.id_estatus in (21)

-- Casos Cerrados
 select 
          ec.tx_nom_edo_caso::Text estatus,
          d.tx_nom_sub_categoria::Text servicio,
          count(c.id_caso)::Text subtotal,
          (select count(*) from caso where id_edo_caso in (7))::Text Total
        from 
            caso c 
            inner join edo_caso ec on c.id_edo_caso = ec.id_edo_caso 
            inner join public.caso_sub_categoria d on d.id_caso_sub_categoria = c.id_caso_subcateg
        where 
            ec.id_edo_caso in (7)
            GROUP BY ec.tx_nom_edo_caso, servicio;

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (1)
    --and d.active = 1
    and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso
where b.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598) 
and b.principal is true
--and d.active = 1
and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
where b.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598) 
and b.principal is true
--and d.active = 1
and d.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
where b.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598) 
and b.principal is true
--and d.active = 1
and d.id_estatus in (6) 
and a.verificado is null 
and (a.feedback < 3 or a.feedback is null)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
where b.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598) 
and b.principal is true
--and d.active = 1
and d.id_estatus in (6) 
and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

-- Porcentaje de Eficiencia Casos Cerrados
SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::decimal * 100 / (-- Casos Recibidos
                                            SELECT count(a.id)
                                            FROM gestion.caso a
                                            inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
                                            inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso
                                            where b.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598) 
                                            and b.principal is true
                                            --and d.active = 1
                                            and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8) )::decimal, 2) as porcentaje
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
where b.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598) 
and b.principal is true
--and d.active = 1
and d.id_estatus in (6) 
and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

select to_char(a.fecha, 'dd-mm-YYYY') as fecham, to_char(a.fecha, 'mm-dd') as fechaa, count(a.fecha) as total
from gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = d.id_caso--a.id
inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
where a.fecha > CAST(now()::timestamp AS DATE) - CAST('15 days' AS INTERVAL)
and b.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598) 
--and d.active = 1 
and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
and b.principal is true
group by fecham, fechaa
order by fechaa

panels.title: HISTÓRICO DE CASOS RECIBIDO EN EL SISTEMA DESDE LA VENAPP (ÚLTIMOS DÍAS)

targets.rawSql:
-- Total de Casos por Estado
select 
	b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
    from gestion.caso a
	 inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
   	inner join gestion.historico c on c.id_caso = a.id  
	 inner join gestion.responsable d on d.id_caso = c.id_caso --a.id
	 inner join gestion.resolutorio e on e.id = d.id_resolutorio
	 where  d.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595) 
	 /*and c.active = 1*/ and c.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)
    group by estado
    order by total desc
    Limit 10;

panels.title: ESTADOS CON MAYOR NUMERO DE CASOS EN EL SISTEMA

targets.rawSql:
-- Total de Casos por Estado
select 
	b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
    from gestion.caso a
	 inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
   	inner join gestion.historico c on c.id_caso = a.id  
	 inner join gestion.responsable d on d.id_caso = c.id_caso --a.id
	 inner join gestion.resolutorio e on e.id = d.id_resolutorio
	 where  d.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598) 
	 --and c.active = 1 
	 and c.id_estatus in (6)
    group by estado
    order by total desc
    Limit 10;

panels.title: ESTADOS CON MAYOR NUMERO DE CASOS ATENDIDOS
REPORTE GENERAL DE LOS CASOS DE AGUA

targets.rawSql:
select count(a.id) as TOTAL
	from gestion.caso a
	  inner join gestion.historico b on b.id_caso = a.id  
	  inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso = b.id_caso --a.id
	  where  a.id_sub_categoria in (1) 
	        and b.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8) --and b.active = 1
		      and c.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598)

select count(*) as TOTAL
                from gestion.caso a
                inner join gestion.historico c on c.id_caso = a.id  
				inner join gestion.responsable d on d.id_caso = c.id_caso --a.id
            where a.id_sub_categoria in (1) and 
                c.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)
				        and a.id_extra_categoria is not null
				        and d.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598)
                --and c.active = 1

select count(*) as TOTAL
      from gestion.caso a
          inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
					inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = d.id_caso --a.id
      where a.id_sub_categoria in (1) and 
            d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) /*and d.active = 1*/ and a.id_extra_categoria is null
				    and b.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598)

SELECT case when m.name is null then c.name else m.name end as sub_categoria, COUNT(a.id) as total 
	         FROM gestion.caso a 
                inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
                inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
				        inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = d.id_caso --a.id
                LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria   
            where c.id in (1) and 
			   d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) 
			   --and d.active = 1
			   and b.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598)
            GROUP BY sub_categoria
            ORDER BY total desc;

SELECT i.nombre as estatus, count(a.id) as subtotal,
            (SELECT count(a.id) FROM gestion.caso a
    					inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
    					inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
    					inner join  gestion.historico h ON h.id_caso = a.id
    					inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON h.id_estatus = i.id
    			 		inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso = h.id_caso --a.id
    					where /*h.active = 1 and*/ h.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8) and a.id_sub_categoria in (1)
    					and c.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598))::Text "Total"
      FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
            inner join  gestion.historico h ON h.id_caso = a.id
            inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON h.id_estatus = i.id
			      inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso =  h.id_caso --a.id
         where /*h.active = 1 and*/ h.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8) and a.id_sub_categoria in (1)
		 and c.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595)
         group by estatus

-- Casos Recibidos
        SELECT count(a.id) FROM gestion.caso a
					inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
					inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
					inner join  gestion.historico h ON h.id_caso = a.id
					inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON h.id_estatus = i.id
			 		inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso = h.id_caso --a.id
					where /*h.active = 1 and*/ h.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) and a.id_sub_categoria in (1)
					and c.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598)

SELECT count(a.id) FROM gestion.caso a
					inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
					inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
					inner join  gestion.historico h ON h.id_caso = a.id
					inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON h.id_estatus = i.id
			 		inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso = a.id
					where /*h.active = 1 and*/ h.id_estatus in (6) and a.id_sub_categoria in (1)
					and c.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598)

-- Casos Cerrados
 select 
          ec.tx_nom_edo_caso::Text estatus,
          d.tx_nom_sub_categoria::Text servicio,
          count(c.id_caso)::Text subtotal,
          (select count(*) from caso where id_edo_caso in (7))::Text Total
        from 
            caso c 
            inner join edo_caso ec on c.id_edo_caso = ec.id_edo_caso 
            inner join public.caso_sub_categoria d on d.id_caso_sub_categoria = c.id_caso_subcateg
        where 
            ec.id_edo_caso in (7)
            GROUP BY ec.tx_nom_edo_caso, servicio;

SELECT case when m.name is null then c.name else m.name end as sub_categoria, COUNT(a.id) as total 
	         FROM gestion.caso a 
                inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
                inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
                inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
                inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
				inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = d.id_caso --a.id
                LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria               
            where a.id_sub_categoria in (1) and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) --and d.active = 1
			and b.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598)
            GROUP BY sub_categoria
            ORDER BY total desc;

SELECT case when m.name is null then c.name else m.name end as sub_categoria, COUNT(a.id) as total 
	         FROM gestion.caso a 
                inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
                inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
                inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
                inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
				        inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = d.id_caso --a.id
                LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria               
            where d.id_estatus in (6) --and d.active = 1
			and b.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598)
            GROUP BY sub_categoria
            ORDER BY total desc;

select b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
  from gestion.caso a
	          inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
			      inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso = d.id_caso --a.id
	 where /* d.active = 1 and*/ d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) and a.id_sub_categoria in (1)
			and c.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598)
            group by estado order by total desc Limit 10;

select b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
  from gestion.caso a
	          inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
			      inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso = a.id
	 where  /*d.active = 1 and */ d.id_estatus in (6) and a.id_sub_categoria in (1)
			and c.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598)
            group by estado order by total desc Limit 10;

panels.title: REPORTE GENERAL CASO DE AGUA DE UBCH EN EL SISTEMA

targets.rawSql:
SELECT DISTINCT ON (a.nombre) a.nombre::Text "CODIGO CASO", 
      --a.codigo::Text "CODIGO CASO",
      e.cedula::Text "CEDULA", e.nombre::TEXT "DENUNCIANTE",
			e.telefono::Text "TELEFONO", b.nombre::Text "ESTADO", c.nombre::Text "MUNICIPIO", d.nombre::Text "PARROQ", a.direccion::Text "DIRECCION", a.descripcion::TEXT "DESCRIP", 
			f.name::Text "CATEGORIA", g.name::Text "SUBCATEG",case when m.name is null then 'Sin ExtCateg' else m.name end::Text "EXTCATEG", 
            case when n.name is null then 'Sin Categ Adi' else n.name end::Text "CATEG ADI",
			i.nombre::Text "ESTATUS",
            case when k.nombre is null then 'Analizando' else k.nombre end::Text "INSTITUCION"--,
      --      case when v.name is null then 'Analizando' else (v.name || ' ' || v.last_name ) end::Text "RESPONSABLE",
			--v.phone::Text "TELF. RESP"
            FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
			      inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula -- usuario ubch
            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            inner JOIN gestion.historico h ON h.id_caso = a.id
            inner JOIN gestion.estatus i ON h.id_estatus = i.id            
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = h.id_caso --a.id and j.id_user is not null
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
            LEFT JOIN  public.user w ON w.id = j.id_user
           -- LEFT JOIN  public.user_detail v ON w.id = v.user_id
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category n ON n.id = a.id_adicional_categoria
            where h.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8) /*and h.active = 1*/ and a.id_sub_categoria in (1)
            and j.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598);

panels.title: LISTADO DE CASOS  DE LA BASE DE DATOS
LISTADO DE CASOS  DE AGUA DE LA BASE DE DATOS (UBCH)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
    inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = d.id_caso --a.id
    inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
    where b.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598) 
	  --c.id_sub_categoria in (1)
    --and d.active = 1
    and d.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
    inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = d.id_caso --a.id
    inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
    where b.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598) 
	  --c.id_sub_categoria in (1)
    --and d.active = 1
    and d.id_estatus in (6)

select 
	b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
    from gestion.caso a
	 inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
   inner join gestion.historico c on c.id_caso = a.id  
	 inner join gestion.responsable d on d.id_caso = c.id_caso --a.id
	 inner join gestion.resolutorio e on e.id = d.id_resolutorio
	 where  d.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595) 
	 /*and c.active = 1*/ and c.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8)
    group by estado
    order by total desc;

panels.title: CASOS EN PROCESO POR ENT. FEDERALES

targets.rawSql:
select 
	b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
    from gestion.caso a
	 inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
   inner join gestion.historico c on c.id_caso = a.id  
	 inner join gestion.responsable d on d.id_caso = c.id_caso --a.id
	 inner join gestion.resolutorio e on e.id = d.id_resolutorio
	 where  d.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595) 
	 /*and c.active = 1*/ and c.id_estatus in (6)
    group by estado
    order by total desc;

panels.title: REPORTE GENERAL DE AGUA POR ENTIDADES FEDERALES

targets.rawSql:
select 
            b.nombre::Text "ESTADO", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
			inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso = d.id_caso --a.id
       	where a.id_sub_categoria in (1) /*and d.active = 1*/ and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
			and c.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598)
        group by b.nombre order by TOTAL desc

panels.title: TOTAL CASOS DE AGUA DE UBCH - ENT. FEDERALES (SERVICIOS PRIORIZADOS)

targets.rawSql:
select 
            b.nombre::Text "ESTADO", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
			inner join gestion.responsable c on c.id_caso = d.id_caso --a.id
       	where a.id_sub_categoria in (1) /*and d.active = 1*/ and d.id_estatus in (6)
			and c.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598)
        group by b.nombre
        order by TOTAL desc

panels.title: TOTAL CASOS DE AGUA ATENDIDOS DE  UBCH - ENT. FEDERALES (SERVICIOS PRIORIZADOS)
REPORTE DE CASOS DE AGUA DE UBCH RECIBIDOS-ATENDIDOS (POR ENTIDADES  FEDERALES)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
			inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = d.id_caso --a.id
    where --a.id_sub_categoria in (1)and
    /*d.active = 1
    and*/ d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) 
    and c.id in (22,21,142,148,167,172,190,195,236,265,269,315,327,31,43,67,94,113,121,122,335, 214,250,296)
	and e.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598)

panels.title: TOTAL CASOS DE AGUA POR MUN. CAPITALES

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
			inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = d.id_caso  --a.id
    where --a.id_sub_categoria in (1) and 
    /*d.active = 1
    and*/ d.id_estatus in (6) 
    and c.id in (22,21,142,148,167,172,190,195,236,265,269,315,327,31,43,67,94,113,121,122,335, 214,250,296)
	and e.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598)

select 
           (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "MUNICIPIO", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
			inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = d.id_caso --a.id
       where --a.id_sub_categoria in (1) and
       /*d.active = 1 and*/ d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
       and c.id in (22,21,142,148,167,172,190,195,236,265,269,315,327,31,43,67,94,113,121,122,335, 214,250,296)
	   and e.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598)
        group by c.nombre, b.nombre
        order by TOTAL desc

            count(a.id) as TOTAL

            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio

panels.title: REPORTE DE CASOS DE AGUA RECIBIDO-ATENDIDO POR MUNICIPIOS(CAPITALES DE ENTIDADES FEDERALES )

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id
			inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = d.id_caso --a.id
    where --a.id_sub_categoria in (1) and
    /*d.active = 1
    and*/ d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) 
    and c.id in (127,184,24,32,255,51,182,149,204,20,239,212,290,166) 
	and e.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598)

SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id
			inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = a.id
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (1)
    --and d.active = 1
    and d.id_estatus in (6) 
    and c.id in (127,184,24,32,255,51,182,149,204,20,239,212,290,166) 
	and e.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595)

select (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "MUNICIPIO", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
			inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = d.id_caso --a.id
     where --a.id_sub_categoria in (1) and 
        /*d.active = 1 and*/ d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
        and c.id in (127,184,24,32,255,51,182,149,204,20,239,212,290,166) 
	      and e.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598)
       group by c.nombre, b.nombre order by TOTAL desc

select (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "MUNICIPIO", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
			      inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = d.id_caso --a.id
     where --a.id_sub_categoria in (1) and 
     /*d.active = 1 and*/ d.id_estatus in (6)
     and c.id in (127,184,24,32,255,51,182,149,204,20,239,212,290,166) 
	   and e.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598)
       group by c.nombre, b.nombre
        order by TOTAL desc

panels.title: REPORTE DE CASOS DE AGUA RECIBIDO-ATENDIDOS DE OTROS MUNICIPIOS  (CIUDADES IMPORTANTES)

targets.rawSql:
select (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "PARROQUIAS", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.parroquia c on c.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
			inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = d.id_caso --a.id
     where --a.id_sub_categoria in (1) and 
        /*d.active = 1 and*/ d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)
	  		and e.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598)
       group by c.nombre, b.nombre
        order by TOTAL desc limit 50

select (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "PARROQUIAS", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.parroquia c on c.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
			inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso = d.id_caso --a.id
     where --a.id_sub_categoria in (1) and 
       /* d.active = 1 and*/ d.id_estatus in (6)
	  		and e.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598)
       group by c.nombre, b.nombre
        order by TOTAL desc limit 50
